item.title: Jamstack
item.description: JAMstack Fast, secure sites & dynamic apps Served without webservers The JAMstack is not about specific technologies (about operating systems, specific web servers, backend programming languages, or databases). It’s about following some paradigms with building the web that delivers better performance, higher security, lower cost of scaling, and a better developer experience. JavaScript APIs Markup JAM A site made with the JAMstack doesn't have to include all of these attributes J: Any dynamic programming during the request/response cycle is handled by JavaScript, running entirely on the client.

item.title: Hiring
item.description: Hiring View notes Why? To hire or not to hire? That is the question. Why is hiring important? Do you feel like we make it a priority here? Leaders of companies that go from good to great start not with “where” but with “who.” They start by getting the right people on the bus, the wrong people off the bus, and the right people in the right seats.
